Class Name.AtHigherLevels: 1d10 (or 6) + your Constitution modifier per fighter level after 1st

Class Name.Skills: Choose two skills from Acrobatics, Animal Handling, Athletics, History, Insight, Intimidation, Perception, and Survival

Equipment: (a) chain mail or (b) leather, longbow, and 20 arrows
(a) a martial weapon and a shield or (b) two martial weapons
(a) a light crossbow and 20 bolts or (b) two handaxes
(a) a dungeoneer's pack or (b) an explorer's pack

Class Name.Class Feature Description: You choose a fighting style as your speciality. Choose one of the following Archery, Defense, Dueling, Great Weapon Fighting, Protection, or Two-Weapon Fighting.

Class Name.Class Featrue Description: You have a limited well of stamina that you can draw on to protect yourself from harm. On your turn, you can use a bonus action to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + your fighter level. Once you use this feature, you must finish a short or long rest before you can use it again.

Class Name.Class Feature Description: Starting at 2nd level, you can push yourself beyond your normal limits for a moment. On your turn, you can take one additional action.

At 3rd level, you choose an archetype that you strive to emulate in your combat styles and techniques. The archetype you choose grants you features at 3rd level and again at 7th, 10th, 15th, and 18th level.
When reaching 4th, 8th, 12th, 16th, and 19th level, you can increase one ability score by 2, or 2 ability scores by 1.
Beginning at 5th level, you can attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the attack action on your turn
Class Name.Class Feature Desctiption: The number of attacks increases to three when you reach 11th level and to four times when you reach 20th level in this class

Class Name.Class Feature Description: Beginning at 9th level, you can reroll a saving throw that you fail. If you do so, you must use the new roll, and you can't use this feature again until you finish a long rest. You can use this feature twice between long rests starting at 13th level and three times between long rests starting at 17th level.
